title: Visit norway profile font
content:
Anyone know what font visitnorway.com uses as their profilefont?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture5.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140525064356/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture5.gif) | 4.52 KB |
author: pylsa

comments.content: What you mean by profilefont? On the site I see a lot of FF Dax and the URL in your image might be Dax as well.
NORWAY POWERED BY NATURE looks like Frutiger Bold Condensed with added stroke (rounded).
The web site has not been updated with the new profile... The picture attached is taken from a pdf
when you're referring to profile, do you mean the logo or the branding?
